mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id, n.customs_id, n.title, COALESCE(n.content, '') AS content, n.create_at, n.type, c.id AS customs_customs_id, c.role, c.name FROM Notice n LEFT JOIN Customs c ON n.customs_id = c.id ORDER BY n.notice_id DESC;

SELECT n.notice_id, n.customs_id, n.title, COALESCE(n.content, '') AS content, n.create_at, n.type, c.id AS customs_customs_id, c.role, c.name FROM Notice n LEFT JOIN Customs c ON n.customs_id = c.id WHERE n.type = #{type} ORDER BY n.notice_id DESC;

SELECT n.notice_id, n.customs_id, n.title, COALESCE(n.content, '') AS content, n.create_at, n.type, c.id AS customs_customs_id, c.role, c.name FROM Notice n LEFT JOIN Customs c ON n.customs_id = c.id WHERE n.notice_id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notice (customs_id, title, content, type) VALUES (#{customs.id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type});
mapper.update: UPDATE Notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, type = #{type} WHERE notice_id = #{id};
